text: It could not be further removed from the grandeur of St George's Chapel at Windsor Castle. While Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are planning their wedding – expected to attract a global TV audience of one billion – The Mail on Sunday can today reveal the extraordinary New Age nuptials of Meghan's parents Tom and Doria. The pair married on December 23, 1979 at the wacky Self - Realisation Fellowship Temple on gaudy Sunset Boulevard in Los Angeles. The faux - Indian temple adorned with gold orb - topped turrets, stone elephants and plastic Buddhas is a stone's throw from where Hugh Grant was infamously caught with prostitute Divine Brown.
